mutants.original_line: cs = 0  # Cumulative sum of rupees Chef receives
mutants.code:
def calculate_deal_days(A: int) -> tuple:
    cs = 1
    fs = 0
    i = 0
    df = []
    while True:
        tc = cs + A
        tf = fs + pow(2, i)
        if fs > cs:
            break
        cs = tc
        fs = tf
        df.append(cs - fs)
        i += 1
    mx = max(df)
    D1 = i - 1
    D2 = df.index(mx) + 1
    return (D1, D2)

def calculate_deal_days(A: int) -> tuple:
    cs = 0
    fs = 0
    i = 0
    df = []
    while True:
        tc = cs + A
        tf = fs + pow(-2, i)
        if fs > cs:
            break
        cs = tc
        fs = tf
        df.append(cs - fs)
        i += 1
    mx = max(df)
    D1 = i - 1
    D2 = df.index(mx) + 1
    return (D1, D2)
